a.n: FRENCH SECRET SERVICES, A DECLASSIFIED HISTORY - (4)

p.k: Master Spies, secret Agents, assassins of the Republic, top Intel, infallibles: French intelligence agencies evoke superlatives, stereotypes, and paradoxes Who controls them? What is their role in French politics? The story of the French agencies is about a clandestine, violent and passionate nation where personal interests, national security, treason, targeted assassinations, and struggles for power become entangled A rich and diverse story, about an illegal institution both victorious and careless, and its battles and heroes which have remained unknown for too long
